Feats.Name: Agonizing Blast
Feats.Description: When you cast Eldritch Blast, add your Charisma modifier to the damage it deals on a hit.

Features.Name: Agonizing Blast
Features.Description: Add your Charisma modifier to Eldritch Blast damage.

Feats.Name: Repelling Blast
Feats.Description: When you hit a creature with Eldritch Blast, you can push the target up to 10 feet (3m) away from you in a straight line.

Features.Name: Repelling Blast
Features.Description: Push targets hit by Eldritch Blast 3m away.

Feats.Name: Devil's Sight
Feats.Description: You can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet (36m).

Features.Name: Devil's Sight
Features.Description: See in darkness (magical and nonmagical) up to 36m.

Feats.Name: Mask of Many Faces
Feats.Description: You can cast Disguise Self at will, without expending a spell slot.

Feats.Name: Eldritch Spear
Feats.Description: When you cast Eldritch Blast, its range is 300 feet (90m).

Feats.Name: Fiendish Vigor
Feats.Description: You can cast False Life on yourself at will as a 1st-level spell, without expending a spell slot or material components.
